card.name: Bronze-Arm Tribe
card.text: ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, put the top card of your deck into your mana zone.

card.name: Natural Snare
card.text: ■ Shield Trigger ■ Choose one of your opponent's creatures in the battle zone and put it into his mana zone.

card.name: Hell's Scrapper
card.text: ■ Shield Trigger ■ Destroy any number of your opponent's creatures that have total power 5000 or less.

card.name: Super Dragon Machine Dolzark
card.text: ■ Multi ■ Whenever one of your other creatures that has Dragon in its race attacks, you may choose one of your opponent's creatures in the battle zone that has power 5000 or less and put it into his mana zone. ■ Double Breaker

card.name: Bolshack Yamato Dragon
card.text: ■ Speed Attacker ■ Double Breaker ■ While attacking, this creature gets +1000 power for each fire card in your graveyard. ■ When you would destroy one of your opponent's creatures that has power 6000 or less by the effect of tooltip

card.name: Bolmeteus "Kensei" Dragon
card.text: ■ Gravity Zero ■ Double Breaker ■ Whenever this creature attacks, you may destroy one of your opponent's creatures that has power 6000 or less. ■ While this creature is in the battle zone, it also has the Card Name

card.name: Zack Pichi, Winged Dragon Admiral
card.text: ■ Double Breaker ■ When you put this creature, reveal the top 3 cards of your deck. Put all Armored Dragons and Fire Birds from among them into your hand, and put the rest on the bottom of your deck in any order. If all the revealed cards were Dragons, this creature gets "speed attacker" until the End Step ■ When this creature would be discarded during your opponent's turn, you may put it instead.

card.name: Infinity "Hidden Blade" Dragon
card.text: ■ Double Breaker ■ Whenever one of your Dragon creatures is destroyed, you may put the top card of your deck into your graveyard. If that card is a Dragon or Samurai creature that costs 7 or less, you may put it into the battle zone.

card.name: Terradragon Balgazarmas
card.text: ■ Whenever one of your creatures that has Dragon in its race attacks, you may reveal the top card of your deck. If it's a Dragon, put it into your hand. If it isn't a Dragon, put it into your mana zone.

card.name: Geo Goctra, Armed Dragon
card.text: ■ Multi ■ Samurai Generation ■ Your other creatures in the battle zone that cost 4 or more get +2000 power and become Armored Dragon, Earth Dragon and Samurai in addition to their current race(s). ■ Double Breaker
